Package com.saicone.rtag.util

Class EasyLookup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saicone.rtag.util.EasyLookup
  • public class EasyLookup
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle reflection lookups in a easy way.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.Class<?> addClass​(java.lang.String name)
      Same has Class.forName(String) but save the class into memory.
      static java.lang.Class<?> addClass​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Save class into memory with provided ID to get from classById(String).
      static java.lang.Class<?> addClass​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String name)
      Same has Class.forName(String) but save the class into memory with provided ID to get from classById(String).
      static java.lang.Class<?> addNMSClass​(java.lang.String name)
      Save the typically net.minecraft.server class into memory.
      For +1.17 servers compatibility the name must be the full class path after "net.minecraft."
      static java.lang.Class<?> addNMSClass​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String name)
      Save the typically net.minecraft.server class into memory with specified ID.
      For +1.17 servers compatibility the name must be the full class path after "net.minecraft."
      static java.lang.Class<?> addOBCClass​(java.lang.String name)
      Save the typically org.bukkit.craftbukkit class into memory.
      Name must be the full path after "org.bukkit.craftbukkit.ServerInstance.version."
      static java.lang.Class<?> addOBCClass​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String name)
      Save the typically org.bukkit.craftbukkit class into memory with specified ID.
      Name must be the full path after "org.bukkit.craftbukkit.ServerInstance.version."
      static java.lang.Class<?> classById​(java.lang.String id)
      Get previously saved class by it ID.
      static java.lang.Class<?>[] classesOf​(java.lang.Object... classes)
      Same has classOf(Object) but for multiple objects.
      static java.lang.Class<?> classOf​(java.lang.Object object)
      Get class represented by Object.
      If object is instance of Class will return itself, otherwise return classById(String).
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle constructor​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.Object... classes)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findConstructor(Class, MethodType) without creating a MethodType, it also provide void class at first argument has default.
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
      See also unreflectConstructor(Object, Object...) for private constructors.
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle getter​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object returnType)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findGetter(Class, String, Class) without creating a MethodType, this method require to specify the return type class of Field and its only compatible with public instance fields, see staticGetter(Object, String, Object) for static getter.
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
      See also unreflectGetter(Object, String) for private getters.
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle method​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object returnType, java.lang.Object... classes)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findVirtual(Class, String, MethodType) without creating a MethodType, this method require to specify the return type class of reflected Method and its only compatible with instance public methods, see staticMethod(Object, String, Object, Object...) for static public methods.
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
      See also unreflectMethod(Object, String, Object...) for private methods.
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles.Lookup privateLookup​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Same has MethodHandles.privateLookupIn(Class, MethodHandles.Lookup) but save the result into memory.
      static java.lang.Object safeInvoke​(java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle method, java.lang.Object arg)
      Invoke MethodHandle without exception.
      static java.lang.Object safeInvoke​(java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle method, java.lang.Object... args)
      Invoke MethodHandle without exception.
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle setter​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object returnType)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findSetter(Class, String, Class) without creating a MethodType, this method require to specify the return type class of Field and its only compatible with public instance fields, see staticSetter(Object, String, Object) for static setter.
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
      See also unreflectSetter(Object, String) for private setters.
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle staticGetter​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object returnType)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findStaticGetter(Class, String, Class) without creating a MethodType, this method require to specify the return type class of Field and its only compatible with instance fields
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
      See also unreflectGetter(Object, String) for private getters.
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle staticMethod​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object returnType, java.lang.Object... classes)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findStatic(Class, String, MethodType) without creating a MethodType, this method require to specify the return type class of reflected Method and only compatible with static methods.
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
      See also unreflectMethod(Object, String, Object...) for private methods.
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle staticSetter​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object returnType)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findStaticSetter(Class, String, Class) without creating a MethodType, this method require to specify the return type class of Field and its only compatible with instance fields
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
      See also unreflectSetter(Object, String) for private setters.
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle unreflectConstructor​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.Object... classes)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.unreflectConstructor(Constructor), this method creates an accessible Constructor and unreflect it, useful for private constructors.
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle unreflectGetter​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.String name)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.unreflectGetter(Field), this method creates a accessible Field and unreflect it, can be static or instance field.
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle unreflectMethod​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object... classes)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.unreflect(Method), this method creates and accessible Method and unreflect it, can be static or instance method.
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
      static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle unreflectSetter​(java.lang.Object clazz, java.lang.String name)
      Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.unreflectSetter(Field), this method creates a accessible Field and unreflect it, can be static or instance field.
      Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • classOf

        public static java.lang.Class<?> classOf​(java.lang.Object object)
        Get class represented by Object.
        If object is instance of Class will return itself, otherwise return classById(String).
        Parameters:
        object - Class or String.
        Returns:
        A class represented by provided object or null.

        Same has classOf(Object) but for multiple objects.
        Parameters:
        classes - Classes objects.
        Returns:
        A array of classes represented by objects.

        Added class.

      • privateLookup

        public static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles.Lookup privateLookup​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Same has MethodHandles.privateLookupIn(Class, MethodHandles.Lookup) but save the result into memory.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Target class.
        Returns:
        Private lookup or null.

      • constructor

        public static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle constructor​(java.lang.Object clazz,
                                                        java.lang.Object... classes)
                                                 throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findConstructor(Class, MethodType) without creating a MethodType, it also provide void class at first argument has default.
        Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
        See also unreflectConstructor(Object, Object...) for private constructors.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to find constructor.
        classes - Required classes in constructor.
        Returns:
        A MethodHandle representing class constructor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the constructor does not exist.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if access checking fails or if the method's variable arity modifier bit is set and asVarargsCollector fails.

      • unreflectConstructor

        public static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle unreflectConstructor​(java.lang.Object clazz,
                                                                 java.lang.Object... classes)
                                                          throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                                 java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.unreflectConstructor(Constructor), this method creates an accessible Constructor and unreflect it, useful for private constructors.
        Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to find constructor.
        classes - Required classes in constructor.
        Returns:
        A MethodHandle representing class constructor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if a matching method is not found.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if access checking fails or if the method's variable arity modifier bit is set and asVarargsCollector fails.

      • method

        public static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle method​(java.lang.Object clazz,
                                                   java.lang.String name,
                                                   java.lang.Object returnType,
                                                   java.lang.Object... classes)
                                            throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                   java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findVirtual(Class, String, MethodType) without creating a MethodType, this method require to specify the return type class of reflected Method and its only compatible with instance public methods, see staticMethod(Object, String, Object, Object...) for static public methods.
        Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
        See also unreflectMethod(Object, String, Object...) for private methods.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to find public method.
        name - Method name.
        returnType - Return type class for method.
        classes - Required classes in method.
        Returns:
        A MethodHandle representing a instance method for provided class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the method does not exist.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if access checking fails, or if the method is static, or if the method's variable arity modifier bit is set and asVarargsCollector fails.

      • unreflectMethod

        public static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle unreflectMethod​(java.lang.Object clazz,
                                                            java.lang.String name,
                                                            java.lang.Object... classes)
                                                     throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                            java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.unreflect(Method), this method creates and accessible Method and unreflect it, can be static or instance method.
        Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to find method.
        name - Method name.
        classes - Required classes in method.
        Returns:
        A MethodHandle representing a method for provided class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if a matching method is not found or if the name is "<init>"or "<clinit>".
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if access checking fails or if the method's variable arity modifier bit is set and asVarargsCollector fails.

      • staticMethod

        public static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle staticMethod​(java.lang.Object clazz,
                                                         java.lang.String name,
                                                         java.lang.Object returnType,
                                                         java.lang.Object... classes)
                                                  throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                         java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findStatic(Class, String, MethodType) without creating a MethodType, this method require to specify the return type class of reflected Method and only compatible with static methods.
        Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
        See also unreflectMethod(Object, String, Object...) for private methods.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to find method.
        name - Method name.
        returnType - Return type class for method.
        classes - Required classes in method.
        Returns:
        A MethodHandle representing a static method for provided class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the method does not exist.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if access checking fails, or if the method is not static, or if the method's variable arity modifier bit is set and asVarargsCollector fails.

      • getter

        public static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle getter​(java.lang.Object clazz,
                                                   java.lang.String name,
                                                   java.lang.Object returnType)
                                            throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                                   java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.findGetter(Class, String, Class) without creating a MethodType, this method require to specify the return type class of Field and its only compatible with public instance fields, see staticGetter(Object, String, Object) for static getter.
        Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
        See also unreflectGetter(Object, String) for private getters.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to find getter.
        name - Field name.
        returnType - Return type class for provided field name.
        Returns:
        A MethodHandle representing a field getter for provided class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - if the field does not exist.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if access checking fails, or if the field is static.

      • unreflectGetter

        public static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle unreflectGetter​(java.lang.Object clazz,
                                                            java.lang.String name)
                                                     throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                                            java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Easy way to invoke MethodHandles.Lookup.unreflectGetter(Field), this method creates a accessible Field and unreflect it, can be static or instance field.
        Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to find getter.
        name - Field name.
        Returns:
        A MethodHandle representing a field getter for provided class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - if a field with the specified name is not found.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if access checking fails.

      • staticGetter

        public static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle staticGetter​(java.lang.Object clazz,
                                                         java.lang.String name,
                                                         java.lang.Object returnType)
                                                  throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                                         java.lang.IllegalAccessException

        Required classes can be Strings to get by classById(String).
        See also unreflectGetter(Object, String) for private getters.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to find getter.
        name - Field name.
        returnType - Return type class for provided field name.
        Returns:
        A MethodHandle representing a field getter for provided class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - if the field does not exist.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if access checking fails, or if the field is not static.

                                                   java.lang.Object returnType)
                                            throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,

        public static java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle staticSetter​(java.lang.Object clazz,
                                                         java.lang.String name,
                                                         java.lang.Object returnType)
                                                  throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
